sentence.Network_en: The hospital staff were very apologetic but that couldn't really compensate.
sentence.Network_cn: 医院的工作人员深表歉意，但这真的于事无补。

sentence.Network_en: They were almost apologetic about the improvements they'd made.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于他们所做的改进，他们简直感到愧疚。

sentence.Network_en: "I don't follow football," she said with an apologetic smile.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ①护教学（apologetic）（Apologetics）——又称为「辨道学」、「卫道学」或「辨惑学」。凡有关基督教的可信性，诸如神的存在、圣经的可靠， …

GRE逆序_馆档网 ... epideictic 夸耀的 apologetic 道歉的，歉意的 apathetic 冷漠的，无动于衷的.
雅思词汇汇总IELTS高频词汇 - 豆丁网 ... anyhow ad. 不论用何种方法；无论如何 apologetic a. 表示歉意的 apparatus n. 仪器；设备.

list.abs: at the beginning year , limited company of toy of rich Yang Jiayu ( next weighing abundant ) general manager Xia Zujun sent an apologetic letter through the network .今年初，富阳嘉裕玩具有限公司（下称“嘉裕”)总经理夏祖军通过网络发了一封道歉信。
say_百度百科 ... say aloud 大声地说 say apologetically 抱歉地说 say approximately 大概地说.
...基督教辨惑学（Christian apologetics，这个词来源于希腊语词汇ἀπολογία，意为“以言语辩护”），或称基督教护教学，是基督教神学的一个分支领域，主要是为了展现基督教信仰的理性基础，针对批评而进行辩护，并揭露其他类型世界观中可察觉的缺陷。cite_book |author=John M. Frame |title=Apologetics to the G.
不_互动百科 ... [feel apologetic;be sorry] 过意不去 [shudder with fear;tremble with fear] 不冷而发抖。指恐惧心理引起的惊抖.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (as a noun denoting a formal justification): from French apologétique or late Latin apologeticus, from Greek apologētikos, from apologeisthei 'speak in one's own defence', from apologia (see apology)The current sense dates from the mid 19th cent

entry.tran: 表示歉意的；认错的；愧疚的
entry.def: If you are apologetic, you show or say that you are sorry for causing trouble for someone, for hurting them, or for disappointing them.

example.ex: The hospital staff were very apologetic but that couldn't really compensate...
example.tran: 医院的工作人员深表歉意，但这真的于事无补。

example.ex: They were almost apologetic about the improvements they'd made...
example.tran: 对于他们所做的改进，他们简直感到愧疚。

stems_affixes.word_buile: apology辩解,道歉+etic属于……的→apologetic道歉的

sentences.cn: 巴尼听起来几乎是在道歉。

sentences.en: He gave a slight, apologetic cough and said, ‘Excuse me.’
sentences.cn: 他抱歉地轻轻咳了一声说：“对不起。”

sentences.en: He was profusely apologetic about the mistake.
sentences.cn: 他对这个错误一再表示歉意。
